Literature.Title: Development of novel antimicrobial peptides derived from anti-lipopolysaccharide factor of the swimming crab, Portunus trituberculatus.
Literature.Author: Nam BH, Park EH, Shin EH, Kim YO, Kim DG, Kong HJ, Park JY, Seo JK

Sequence Information.Target Organism: Bacillus cereus ATCC 21772(MEC=1.88µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus RM4220(MEC=1.79µg/ml),Streptococcus iniae FP5229(MEC=2.3µg/ml),Streptococcus mutans KCTC 3065(MEC=1.49µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa KCTC 2004(MEC=1.72µg/ml),Escherichia coli KCTC 1116(MEC=1.79µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(MEC=1.95µg/ml),Candida albicans KCTC 7965(no activity data),Escherichia coli ML-35p(MBC=6.25µg/ml)
